XXvadhdhdu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān kośāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ viharati sma |
XXvadhdhdu:3: kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare ghoṣitārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvakair asaṃkhyayaiś ca bodhisattvaiḥ sarvabuddhaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:4: tatra khalu bhagavāṃs tasyām eva parṣadi tair eva parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sarvadāridryavyādhiduḥkhārṇavapariśoṣaṇaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayati sma
XXvadhdhdu:5: | ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati
XXvadhdhdu:7: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma
XXvadhdhdu:8: upaśāntendriyopaśāntamānaso bahuputro bahuduhitaro bahubhṛtyajanasaṃpannaḥ śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ
XXvadhdhdu:9: tena khalu punaḥ samayena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat |
XXvadhdhdu:10: ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:11: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kiñcid eva pradeśaṃ sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya |
XXvadhdhdu:12: evam ukte bhagavān sucandragṛhapatim etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:13: pṛccha tvaṃ gṛhapate yad yad evākāṃkṣasyan te tatra praśnavyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye |
XXvadhdhdu:14: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatiḥ sādhu bhagavann iti bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:15: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati |
XXvadhdhdu:17: atha khalu bhagavān jānann eva sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:18: kim iti tvaṃ gṛhapate daridratāyāḥ paripraśnaṃ pṛcchasi?
XXvadhdhdu:19: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:21: bhagavan daridro 'haṃ sugata bahupoṣo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasaṃpannaḥ tad deśayatu bhagavān dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrasattvā adaridrā bhaveyuḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:24: priyā manāpāḥ paramamanojñāḥ darśanīyāś ca bhaveyuḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:30: evam ukte bhagavān sarvāśāparipūrakena brahmasvareṇa sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:31: asti gṛhapate bhūtapūrvam atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhagavān śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ
XXvadhdhdu:32: ca buddho bhagavān, tasya tathāgatasyāntike mayā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma
XXvadhdhdu:34: śrutvā ca udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā deśitā paryavāptā |
XXvadhdhdu:36: aham apy etarhi te kulaputra tān dhāraṇīṃ tathā bhāṣiṣye |
XXvadhdhdu:37: yathā asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena kulaputra mānuṣā na viheṭhayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:59: evaṃ yāvat puṣpāhārāḥ phalāhārāḥ patrāhārāḥ tvacāhārāḥ skandhāhārāḥ mūlāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ dhūpāhārāḥ dīpāhārāḥ mālāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:60: ojohārāḥ svedāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ raktāhārāḥ māṃsāhārāḥ medāhārāḥ asthyāhārāḥ majjāhārāḥ rudhirāhārāḥ śukrāhārāḥ jīvitāhārāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:61: evaṃ yāvad viṣṭhāhārāḥ mutrāhārāḥ kheṭāhārāḥ siṃghāṇakāhārāḥ kledāhārā śleṣmāhārāḥ ucchviṣṭāhārāḥ anucchiṣṭāhārāḥ ucchiṣṭāhārā na viheṭhayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:67: rūpāhārāḥ śabdāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ sparśāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ nānārūpāhārāḥ (Vdh-DH_133) virūpāhārāḥ anantarūpāhārāḥ kāmarūpāhārāḥ
XXvadhdhdu:68: vicitrarūpāhārāḥ balāhārāḥ balyāhārāḥ aśucyāhārāḥ vicitrāhārāḥ yāvad ucchiṣṭāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti
XXvadhdhdu:69: yāvat khecarāḥ bhūcarāḥ antarīkṣacarāḥ jalacarāḥ sthalacarāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:70: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ mahāvajreṇa mūrdhnisphālanāya sphoṭanāya praharaṇāya hūṃ 2 phaṭ vajreṇa sarvaduṣṭān sarvaśatrūn māraya 2 śoṣaya 2 stambhaya 2 bandhaya 2 hana 2
XXvadhdhdu:71: daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 māraya 2 sarvaśatrūn nāśaya 2 hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:72: yasya ca kulaputra iyaṃ sā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā hṛdayagatā gṛhagatā hastagatā pustakagatā śrutimātragatā paryavāptā manasā suparicintitā dhāritā vācitā likhitā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā ca tad bhaviṣyati |
XXvadhdhdu:73: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya yogasaṃbhārāya bhaviṣyati |
XXvadhdhdu:74: yaś cemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇīṃ tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtvā āvartayet |
XXvadhdhdu:76: ardharātre tricaturvārāṇi tasya devatā āttamanasthā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto vācayet
XXvadhdhdu:77: tadā bhagavatyā vasudhārayā svayam evāgatya dhanadhānyahiraṇyavṛṣṭiṃ pātayiṣyanti |
XXvadhdhdu:78: prītyā tathāgataśāsane prītyā buddhaprajñaptyā prītyā dharmaprajñaptyā prītyā saṃghaprajñaptyā prītyā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaprajñaptyā prītyā pañcakulāvasthitamudrāmantravidyādevatā prajñaptyā prītyā dharmabhāṇakasyāśayena |
XXvadhdhdu:85: namaḥ kṣemaṅkarasya tathāgatasya namo vajradharasāgaragambhīrasya tathāgatasya |
XXvadhdhdu:86: (Vdh-DH_134) agrayugaprāptebhyo bhadrayugaprāptebhyo vipaśyādibhyaḥ śākyamunibhyo dānapāramitāparipūrṇebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ vipaśyinas tejasā |
XXvadhdhdu:87: ṛddhyā ca śikhinas tathā viśvabhukprajñayā caiva |
XXvadhdhdu:90: maitreyasya pratijñayā samṛddhyantu me tathāgatasya ime mantrapadāḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:94: tadyathā ḥ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ oṃ śrīdhane 2 dhanaiśvarye śukramāṇe(?) akṣayakośe cintitotpādani manasi
XXvadhdhdu:98: koṭe 2 koṭāvare koṭīśvarye anantāparyantasarvaratnavastrālaṅkārābharaṇāni dhanadhānyavṛddhiṃkari cintitotpatti samohani |
XXvadhdhdu:102: sarvabuddhabodhisattvasatye bodhiprāgbhārasatye sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasatye brahmasatye viṣṇusatye rudrasatye lokapālasatye dhanadājñākari
XXvadhdhdu:111: 2 vigata sa ihāgacchāgaccha bhagavati vasudhāre mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca gṛhe sādhakānāṃ mano icchāgamaṃ paripūraya |
XXvadhdhdu:112: bhagavati uttiṣṭha vidyāsarvabuddhā bhagavantaḥ samājñāpayanti svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:121: oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali kha kha khāhi 2 tiṣṭha
XXvadhdhdu:122: 2 bandha 2 hana 2 daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 garjja 2 visphoṭaya 2
XXvadhdhdu:124: oṃ sumbhani sumbhani hūṃ gṛhṇa 2 gṛhṇāpaya 2 hūṃ ānaya ho bhagavan vidyārāja hūṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:125: oṃ vajrayakṣa hana hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:212: oṃ śrīamoghāṅkuśe jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:225: oṃ śrī tare taratare tāra tame merura virura tāraya 2 svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:226: oṃ śrī tārayantu māṃ bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca icchāgamane oṃ śrī bhagavati oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:227: oṃ śrī bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama mahārakṣāvaraṇaguptiṅkari svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:235: oṃ śrīvasuṃ dade vasudhe kuru 2 svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:248: oṃ śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgatasatyam anusmara 3 svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:253: oṃ śrītaṭa mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvāśāparipūraya 2 mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca gṛhe ākāśagataṃ vā pṛthivīgataṃ vā jalagataṃ vā sthalagataṃ vā antarīkṣagataṃ vā bhūmigataṃ vā svargagataṃ vā martyagataṃ vā pātālagataṃ vā samudragataṃ vā saptadvīpāntagataṃ vā sarvatragataṃ vā parvatāntagataṃ vā |
XXvadhdhdu:254: bhagavati vasudhāre asmin gṛhe maṇimuktivajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatamarakatamusāragalbakarkketanapadmarāgaindranīlādyanekaratnāni sauvarṇarajatatāmralohadhātumūlajīvādīni ca anekadhanadhānyacatuḥṣaṣṭībrīhisahasrāṇi ca mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca sarvopakaraṇāni bharaṇi 2 svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:272: oṃ śrīgurviṇīsukhena prasūtani mahātejaḥ śrī svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:300: oṃ śrīvasudhāre dharaṇī dhāraṇī vasudhāraṇīye svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:305: oṃ śrīśriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brī svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:308: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyasamaye śrīkari vasundhari vasudhe svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:310: oṃ śrīvasudhāre ehy ehi bhagavti samayam anusmara siddhiṃ kuru me hūṃ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:311: oṃ śrīvasudhārā dhāraṇyai varapradāyai sarvadhanadhānyasarvaratnavastrālāṅkārasarvabrīhyādibhiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ samṛddhiṃ me dehi sarvasattvānāṃ ca dehi me śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ vaśaṃ siddhiṃ ca dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:312: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyāya vinmahe sarvaratnālaṅkārasarvopakaraṇāni dhīmahi tanno śrīvasudhāraṇī pracodayāt svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:318: oṃ yānapātra vahe dūragāmini anutpannānāṃ dravyāṇām utpādani utpannānāṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ vṛddhiṃkari ṭili 2 ṭeli 2 iṭa 2 āgaccha āgaccha bhagavati mā vilamba mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca manorathaṃ paripūraya daśabhyo
XXvadhdhdu:319: digbhyaḥ yathodakadhārāḥ paripūrayanti mahīṃ yathā bhāskaro raśminā vidhamayanti tamāṃ cittāntarāṇi tamastimiraṃ yathā sa śītāṃśunāpy āyati sarvoṣadhīḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:321: dhanado varuṇaś caiva indro vaivasvatas tathā tathā mahatī manonugāminī siddhiṃ cintayantu satataṃ sadyaḥ sarvā prayaccha yathākāmaṃ siddhyantāṃ mantrapadānīha |
XXvadhdhdu:322: tadyathā ḥ oṃ kheṭe 2 khiṭi 2 khuṭu 2 chucu 2 muru 2 muruṇḍa (Vdh-DH_140)
XXvadhdhdu:361: oṃ sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:382: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:383: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyāṇi dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:387: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:409: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brīṃ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:425: oṃ śrī jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:426: oṃ śrīguhyasakaṭike sarve ākarṣaya 2 oṃ śrī āharite mahābale hūṃ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:446: oṃ vajrasamāja jaḥ hūṃ baṃ hoḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:456: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca dhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:457: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyaṃ dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:463: utpādayantu me kāṃkṣim aviraham anumodayantu ime mantrapadāḥ siddhyantu |
XXvadhdhdu:471: kiṃ punaḥ śraddhyādhimuktikasya puruṣasya puruṣapramāṇaṃ mahābhogaṃ dadāti |
XXvadhdhdu:473: oṃ vajre 2 mahāvajre vajropame ṭake ṭhake hūṃ phaṭ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:474: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari ehi āgacchāgaccha brīṃ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:477: oṃ aṣṭau yakṣiṇī (Vdh-DH_143) sarvapūjā hūṃ svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:478: oṃ yān yān sarvakāmaṃ iha kāmayati |
XXvadhdhdu:482: oṃ namo devi dhanaduhite vasudhārāṃ pātaya 2 dhaneśvari ratnadehe huru 2
XXvadhdhdu:483: dhaneśvari ratnaṃ me dehi dadāpaya ratnasāgaramahānidhāne nidhānakoṭiśatasahasraparivāre ehy ehi bhagavati vasudhāre praviśya mama puraṃ mama bhavanaṃ mahānidhānaṃ pātaya 2 turu 2 kuru 2 hūṃ phaṭ kailāśanivāsini svāhā |
XXvadhdhdu:485: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa rogadurbhikṣamarakādayo na prabhavanti |
XXvadhdhdu:486: yas tu kulaputra imāni vasudhārānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni tathāgatānām arhatānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇmāsān āvartayet |
XXvadhdhdu:488: yasyāṃ diśi iyaṃ vidyā dhāryate sā dik pūjyamānā bhavati |
XXvadhdhdu:489: yasmin sthāne pūjyate pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śraddhayā paramaśraddhayā vasudhārā pratimāṃ bhaṭṭārikāṃ vā paṭaṃ vā agrato 'nuprasārya candanena caturasraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā puṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhavajaghaṇṭāpatākopaśobhite balinaivedyavividhopacārair yathāvibhavaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dharmabhāṇakaś cāpi
XXvadhdhdu:490: sugandhajalasnātaḥ sugandhāṅgaśucivastraṃ prāvṛtyamayūrāsenopari samupaviśya pratimāpaṭṭādikaṃ vā sthāpayitvā tam evānusmṛtya sūryodayavelāyāṃ paripūjayitvā pratyaham akhaṇḍasamādānato yāvad eva sakalāṃ rātriṃ dhāraṇīm avicchinnam āvartayet |
XXvadhdhdu:493: rātrim atināmayitvā punaḥ pratyuṣe sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto brahmacārī bhūtvā śubhe sthāne sanidānadhāraṇīm avicchinnam āvartayet trīṇi vārāṇi |
XXvadhdhdu:494: tataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārayā gṛhaṃ paripūrayanti |
XXvadhdhdu:495: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaś ca sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati |
XXvadhdhdu:496: yad vā tathaiva pratyuṣe sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto madyapānarahito nirāmiṣālavaṇabhojī brahmacārī pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śubhe sthāne kośakoṣṭhāgāre vā candanena caturasraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ śrīmadāryāvalokiteśvarasya tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ mahāmudrāmantravidyādevatāyāś cāgrato yathāvibhavam udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā susamāhitaḥ tām eva bhagavatiṃ
XXvadhdhdu:497: bhāvayenn ekacittotpādena dānapatihitasukhāśayaḥ śraddhyā paramaśraddhyā sanidānām imāṃ dhāraṇīm ekamahorātraṃ saptāhorātrāṇi vā parikṣānālayann āvicchinnam āvartayet |
XXvadhdhdu:498: ācāryas tathaiva niyamena rātres triṣkṛtvā divasasyāpi triṣkṛtvā sarvabalyupahāraiḥ pūjayet
XXvadhdhdu:499: tathaiva dānapatir api niyamena sarvam ācaret |
XXvadhdhdu:502: tataḥ kṣaṇamātrayā gṛhapate vasudhārayā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārā dānapateḥ gṛhaṃ paripūrayati
XXvadhdhdu:503: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati |
XXvadhdhdu:504: tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate sarvaprayatnīkṛtyodgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma |
XXvadhdhdu:505: tato bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhogāya (Vdh-DH_145) yogasambhārāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya ceti
XXvadhdhdu:507: bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ bhagavato 'ntikād imāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ
XXvadhdhdu:508: | śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
XXvadhdhdu:509: bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:510: udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī prahvīkṛtā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptānumoditā manasā suparicintitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa idānīm ahaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmīti |
XXvadhdhdu:511: atha tatkṣaṇamātreṇa sa sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paripūrṇakośakoṣṭāgāro 'bhūt |
XXvadhdhdu:512: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ punaḥ punar avalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt svagṛhaṃ prakrāntaḥ prakramya ca sa gṛhapatir ābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyaratnajātasamṛddhaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭā ca vismito hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanā pramuditaprītisaumanasyajātaḥ paripūrṇamanorathaṃ parituṣyamāṇe kuśalamūlamṛdusnigdhahṛdaye buddhe bhagavati vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ ca tīvrapremagurugauravaṃ prāsādikabahumāne citrikāraś ca bodhicittaṃ samutpādayati sma |
XXvadhdhdu:513: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma |
XXvadhdhdu:514: gaccha tvaṃ ānanda sucandrasya gṛhapater agāraṃ paśya paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ sarvaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni |
XXvadhdhdu:515: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena sucandraniveśas taṃ gatvā tasyāgāraṃ tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyāyuṣmān ānando vismitaḥ
XXvadhdhdu:516: prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:517: ko (Vdh-DH_146) bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro nāma gṛhapatir mahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭhāgāradhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnajātasamṛddho jātaḥ |
XXvadhdhdu:518: bhagavān āha śrāddhānanda sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā vācitā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśiteti |
XXvadhdhdu:519: tenoktā ānanda tvam apy udgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya bhaviṣyanti tadbahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yasya gṛhapater ānandeyaṃ dhāraṇī hastagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati |
XXvadhdhdu:520: hṛdayagatā dhāritā vācitā cintitā śrutimātragatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā pūjitā ca bhaviṣyati
XXvadhdhdu:523: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nāham ānanda taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi |
XXvadhdhdu:524: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevāsuramānuṣyāṇāṃ ya imāṃ vidyāṃ anyathā kariṣyati atikramiṣyati vācā naitat sthānaṃ vidyate
XXvadhdhdu:525: | tat kasya hetor abhedyāni hy etāny ānanda vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīmantrapadāni na cetāni kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ
XXvadhdhdu:527: kaḥ punar vādo ye pustakagatāni hṛdayagatāni dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti |
XXvadhdhdu:528: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatair iyaṃ bhāṣitā dhāraṇī adhiṣṭhitā svamudrayā mudritā prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā daridrāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ sarvaduṣṭasattvabhayopadrutānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti |
XXvadhdhdu:529: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti |
XXvadhdhdu:530: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat |
XXvadhdhdu:532: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā ||
XXvadhdhdu:537: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXvadhdhdu:538: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam |
XXvadhdhdu:539: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam ity api dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam ity api dhāraya |
XXvadhdhdu:540: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti |
XXvadhdhdu:542: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat |
XXvadhdhdu:543: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
